title: Montana St. tops Illinois St. in wild FCS title game
description: Montana State won its first national championship since 1984 in Monday's first OT in FCS title game history.

title: KD savors winner vs. Suns after being 'kicked out'
description: Rockets star Kevin Durant said hitting the winning shot Monday night against the Suns meant more because it came against his former team, one "that booted you out of the building and scapegoated you for all the problems they had."

title: Sources: RB Lacy signs new deal with Ole Miss

title: Kerr ejected, Curry fouls out as calls rile Warriors
